analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xf7352deca9ff963cf78e4ae56f0ae46316bbc302.sol:
	Contract Waiam has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xf7352deca9ff963cf78e4ae56f0ae46316bbc302.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xf7352deca9ff963cf78e4ae56f0ae46316bbc302.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
